name: Tower of Safety
description:
Protect the countryside! Use the Arrow keys or WASD to shoot in one of four directions! Shoot Dragons! Do not shoot people! Score by letting people enter the Tower of Safety Score by shooting dragons

post your score and any feedback here!

Hangout with me on twitch sometime https://www.twitch.tv/tiger_j

Follow me on twitter too https://twitter.com/stalkjimmy

All assets, music and code was made for the jam by me.

Ask any questions!

UPDATES COMING https://trello.com/b/6gUYgYFs/tower-of-saftey

Aseprite - EDGE 32 pallet only
